content: Dear user, the EAC/USDT trading pair has now been officially listed on the TrueDEX exchange. The Earth Coin EAC is a pure PoW coin born in Canada on December 20, 2013, with a total amount of 13.5 billion yuan. Its vision is to be green, environmentally friendly, and public welfare, making every labor on Earth valuable. Welcome everyone to truedex.io for trading!
